properties.name: --ag-accent-color
properties.description: The 'brand color' for the grid, used wherever a non-neutral color is required. Selections, focus outlines and checkboxes use the accent color by default.

properties.name: --ag-advanced-filter-builder-button-bar-border
properties.description: Color of the dividing line above the buttons in the advanced filter builder

properties.name: --ag-advanced-filter-builder-column-pill-color
properties.description: Color of the column pills in the Advanced Filter Builder

properties.name: --ag-advanced-filter-builder-indent-size
properties.description: Amount that each level of the nesting in the advanced filter builder is indented by

properties.name: --ag-advanced-filter-builder-join-pill-color
properties.description: Color of the join operator pills in the Advanced Filter Builder

properties.name: --ag-advanced-filter-builder-option-pill-color
properties.description: Color of the filter option pills in the Advanced Filter Builder

properties.name: --ag-advanced-filter-builder-value-pill-color
properties.description: Color of the value pills in the Advanced Filter Builder

properties.name: --ag-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the grid. Many UI elements are semi-transparent, so their color blends with the background color.

properties.name: --ag-border-color
properties.description: Default color for borders.

properties.name: --ag-border-radius
properties.description: Default corner radius for many UI elements such as menus, dialogs and form widgets.

properties.name: --ag-browser-color-scheme
properties.description: The CSS color-scheme to apply to the grid, which affects the default appearance of browser scrollbars form inputs unless these have been styled with CSS.

properties.name: --ag-cell-horizontal-padding
properties.description: Padding at the start and end of grid cells and header cells.

properties.name: --ag-cell-horizontal-padding-scale
properties.description: Multiply the cell horizontal padding by a number, e.g. 1.5 to increase by 50%

properties.name: --ag-cell-text-color
properties.description: Color of text in grid cells.

properties.name: --ag-cell-widget-spacing
properties.description: Horizontal spacing between widgets inside cells (e.g. row group expand buttons and row selection checkboxes).

properties.name: --ag-chart-menu-label-color
properties.description: Color of form field labels within the chart editing panel for integrated charts

properties.name: --ag-chart-menu-panel-width
properties.description: Width of the chart editing panel for integrated charts

properties.name: --ag-chrome-background-color
properties.description: Background color for non-data areas of the grid. Headers, tool panels and menus use this color by default.

properties.name: --ag-column-border
properties.description: Vertical borders between columns within the grid only, excluding headers.

properties.name: --ag-column-drop-cell-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the pill shape representing columns in the column drop component

properties.name: --ag-column-drop-cell-text-color
properties.description: Text color for the pill shape representing columns in the column drop component

properties.name: --ag-column-drop-cell-drag-handle-color
properties.description: Color of the drag grip icon in the pill shape representing columns in the column drop component

properties.name: --ag-column-drop-cell-border
properties.description: Border for the pill shape representing columns in the column drop component

properties.name: --ag-column-hover-color
properties.description: Background color when hovering over columns in the grid. This is not visible unless enabled in the grid options.

properties.name: --ag-column-select-indent-size
properties.description: Amount of indentation for each level of children when selecting grouped columns in the column select widget.

properties.name: --ag-dialog-border
properties.description: Border color popup dialogs such as the integrated charts and the advanced filter builder.

properties.name: --ag-dialog-shadow
properties.description: Shadow for popup dialogs such as the integrated charts and the advanced filter builder.

properties.name: --ag-cell-editing-border
properties.description: Border around cells being edited

properties.name: --ag-cell-editing-shadow
properties.description: Shadow for cells being edited

properties.name: --ag-drag-and-drop-image-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the drag and drop image component element when dragging columns

properties.name: --ag-drag-and-drop-image-border
properties.description: Border color of the drag and drop image component element when dragging columns

properties.name: --ag-drag-and-drop-image-shadow
properties.description: Shadow for the drag and drop image component element when dragging columns

properties.name: --ag-drag-handle-color
properties.description: Color of the drag handle on draggable rows and column markers

properties.name: --ag-dropdown-shadow
properties.description: Default shadow for dropdown menus

properties.name: --ag-filter-tool-panel-group-indent
properties.description: How much to indent child columns in the filters tool panel relative to their parent

properties.name: --ag-find-match-color
properties.description: Color of matches used in Find

properties.name: --ag-find-match-background-color
properties.description: Background color of matches used in Find

properties.name: --ag-find-active-match-color
properties.description: Color of the active match used in Find

properties.name: --ag-find-active-match-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the active match used in Find

properties.name: --ag-focus-shadow
properties.description: Shadow around UI controls that have focus e.g. text inputs and buttons. The value must a valid CSS box-shadow.

properties.name: --ag-font-family
properties.description: Default font family for all text. Can be overridden by more specific parameters like `headerFontFamily`

properties.name: --ag-font-size
properties.description: Default font size for text throughout the grid UI

properties.name: --ag-data-font-size
properties.description: Font size for data in grid rows

properties.name: --ag-footer-row-border
properties.description: Horizontal borders above footer components like the pagination and status bars

properties.name: --ag-foreground-color
properties.description: Default color for neutral UI elements. Most text, borders and backgrounds are defined as semi-transparent versions of this color, resulting in a blend between the background and foreground colours.

properties.name: --ag-spacing
properties.description: Amount of spacing around and inside UI elements. All padding and margins in the grid are defined as a multiple of this value.

properties.name: --ag-header-background-color
properties.description: Background color for header and header-like.

properties.name: --ag-header-cell-background-transition-duration
properties.description: Duration in seconds of the background color transition if headerCellHoverBackgroundColor or headerCellMovingBackgroundColor is set.

properties.name: --ag-header-cell-hover-background-color
properties.description: Background color of a header cell when hovering over it, or `transparent` for no change.

properties.name: --ag-header-cell-moving-background-color
properties.description: Background color of a header cell when dragging to reposition it, or `transparent` for no change.

properties.name: --ag-header-column-border
properties.description: Vertical borders between columns within headers.

properties.name: --ag-header-column-border-height
properties.description: Height of the vertical border between column headers. Percentage values are relative to the header height.

properties.name: --ag-header-column-resize-handle-color
properties.description: Color of the drag handle on resizable header columns. Set this to transparent to hide the resize handle.

properties.name: --ag-header-column-resize-handle-height
properties.description: Height of the drag handle on resizable header columns. Percentage values are relative to the header height.

properties.name: --ag-header-column-resize-handle-width
properties.description: Width of the drag handle on resizable header columns.

properties.name: --ag-header-font-family
properties.description: Font family of text in the header

properties.name: --ag-cell-font-family
properties.description: Font family of text in grid cells

properties.name: --ag-header-font-size
properties.description: Size of text in the header

properties.name: --ag-header-font-weight
properties.description: Font weight of text in the header

properties.name: --ag-header-height
properties.description: Height of header rows. NOTE: by default this value is calculated to leave enough room for text, icons and padding. Most applications should leave it as is and use rowVerticalPaddingScale to change padding.

properties.name: --ag-header-row-border
properties.description: Borders between and below header rows.

properties.name: --ag-header-text-color
properties.description: Color of text in the header

properties.name: --ag-header-vertical-padding-scale
properties.description: Multiply the header vertical padding by a number, e.g. 1.5 to increase by 50%

properties.name: --ag-icon-color
properties.description: Color for icons, or `inherit` to take on the text color of the containing component

properties.name: --ag-icon-button-color
properties.description: Default color for clickable icons

properties.name: --ag-icon-button-background-color
properties.description: Default background color for clickable icons

properties.name: --ag-icon-button-background-spread
properties.description: The distance beyond the border of the clickable icons that the background extends to

properties.name: --ag-icon-button-border-radius
properties.description: Corner radius of clickable icon background

properties.name: --ag-icon-button-hover-color
properties.description: Color of clickable icons when hovered

properties.name: --ag-icon-button-hover-background-color
properties.description: Background color for clickable icons when hovered

properties.name: --ag-icon-button-active-color
properties.description: Color of clickable icon buttons when styled as active. This is used for the column filter button when a filter is applied to the column.

properties.name: --ag-icon-button-active-background-color
properties.description: Background color of clickable icon buttons when styled as active. This is used for the column filter button when a filter is applied to the column.

properties.name: --ag-icon-button-active-indicator-color
properties.description: Color of the marker dot shown on icon buttons when styled as active. This is used for the column filter button when a filter is applied to the column.

properties.name: --ag-icon-size
properties.description: The size of square icons and icon-buttons

properties.name: --ag-invalid-color
properties.description: The color for inputs and UI controls in an invalid state.

properties.name: --ag-list-item-height
properties.description: Height of items in scrolling lists e.g. dropdown select inputs and column menu set filters.

properties.name: --ag-menu-background-color
properties.description: Background color for menus e.g. column menu and right-click context menu

properties.name: --ag-menu-border
properties.description: Border around menus e.g. column menu and right-click context menu

properties.name: --ag-menu-separator-color
properties.description: Color of the dividing line between sections of menus e.g. column menu and right-click context menu

properties.name: --ag-menu-shadow
properties.description: Shadow for menus e.g. column menu and right-click context menu

properties.name: --ag-menu-text-color
properties.description: Text color for menus e.g. column menu and right-click context menu

properties.name: --ag-modal-overlay-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the overlay shown over the grid e.g. a data loading indicator.

properties.name: --ag-odd-row-background-color
properties.description: Background color applied to every other row

properties.name: --ag-panel-background-color
properties.description: Background color for panels and dialogs such as the integrated charts and the advanced filter builder.

properties.name: --ag-panel-title-bar-background-color
properties.description: Background color for the title bar of panels and dialogs such as the integrated charts and the advanced filter builder.

properties.name: --ag-panel-title-bar-text-color
properties.description: Text color for the title bar of panels and dialogs such as the integrated charts and the advanced filter builder.

properties.name: --ag-panel-title-bar-icon-color
properties.description: Icon color for the title bar of panels and dialogs such as the integrated charts and the advanced filter builder.

properties.name: --ag-panel-title-bar-font-weight
properties.description: Font weight for the title bar of panels and dialogs such as the integrated charts and the advanced filter builder.

properties.name: --ag-panel-title-bar-border
properties.description: Border below the title bar of panels and dialogs such as the integrated charts and the advanced filter builder.

properties.name: --ag-pinned-column-border
properties.description: Vertical borders between columns that are pinned to the left or right and the rest of the grid

properties.name: --ag-pinned-row-border
properties.description: Horizontal borders between the grid and rows that are pinned to the top or bottom and the rest of the grid

properties.name: --ag-popup-shadow
properties.description: Default shadow for elements that float above the grid and are intended to appear separated from it e.g. dialogs and menus

properties.name: --ag-card-shadow
properties.description: Default shadow for elements that float above the grid and are intended to appear elevated byt still attached e.g. dropdowns and cell editors

properties.name: --ag-range-selection-background-color
properties.description: Background color of selected cell ranges. Choosing a semi-transparent color ensure that multiple overlapping ranges look correct.

properties.name: --ag-range-selection-border-color
properties.description: The color used for borders around range selections. The selection background defaults to a semi-transparent version of this color.

properties.name: --ag-range-selection-border-style
properties.description: Border style around range selections.

properties.name: --ag-range-selection-chart-background-color
properties.description: Background color for cells that provide data to the current range chart

properties.name: --ag-range-selection-chart-category-background-color
properties.description: Background color for cells that provide categories to the current range chart

properties.name: --ag-range-selection-highlight-color
properties.description: Background color to briefly apply to a cell range when the user copies from or pastes into it.

properties.name: --ag-range-header-highlight-color
properties.description: Background color of the grid header when any cell of that header is part of a range. This is not visible unless enabled in the cell selection options.

properties.name: --ag-row-numbers-selected-color
properties.description: Background color of the Row Numbers cells when the range selects all cells for that row.

properties.name: --ag-row-border
properties.description: Horizontal borders between rows.

properties.name: --ag-row-group-indent-size
properties.description: The size of indentation applied to each level of row grouping - deep rows are indented by a multiple of this value.

properties.name: --ag-row-height
properties.description: Height of grid rows. NOTE: by default this value is calculated to leave enough room for text, icons and padding. Most applications should leave it as is and use rowVerticalPaddingScale to change padding.

properties.name: --ag-row-hover-color
properties.description: Background color when hovering over rows in the grid and in dropdown menus. Set to `transparent` to disable the hover effect. Note: if you want a hover effect on one but not the other, use CSS selectors instead of this property.

properties.name: --ag-row-loading-skeleton-effect-color
properties.description: Color of the skeleton loading effect used when loading row data with the Server-side Row Model

properties.name: --ag-row-vertical-padding-scale
properties.description: Multiply the row vertical padding by a number, e.g. 1.5 to increase by 50%. Has no effect if rowHeight is set.

properties.name: --ag-select-cell-background-color
properties.description: Background color for selected items within the multiple select widget

properties.name: --ag-select-cell-border
properties.description: Border for selected items within the multiple select widget

properties.name: --ag-selected-row-background-color
properties.description: Background color of selected rows in the grid and in dropdown menus.

properties.name: --ag-set-filter-indent-size
properties.description: Amount of indentation for each level of child items in the Set Filter list when filtering tree data.

properties.name: --ag-side-bar-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the sidebar that contains the columns and filters tool panels

properties.name: --ag-side-button-bar-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the row of tab buttons at the edge of the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-bar-panel-width
properties.description: Default width of the sidebar that contains the columns and filters tool panels

properties.name: --ag-side-panel-border
properties.description: Borders between the grid and side panels including the column and filter tool bars, and chart settings

properties.name: --ag-side-button-bar-top-padding
properties.description: Spacing between the topmost side button and the top of the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-button-selected-underline-width
properties.description: Width of the underline below the selected tab in the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-button-selected-underline-color
properties.description: Color of the underline below the selected tab in the sidebar, or 'transparent' to disable the underline effect

properties.name: --ag-side-button-selected-underline-transition-duration
properties.description: Duration of the transition effect for the underline below the selected tab in the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-button-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the tab buttons in the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-button-text-color
properties.description: Text color of the tab buttons in the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-button-hover-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the tab buttons in the sidebar when hovered

properties.name: --ag-side-button-hover-text-color
properties.description: Text color of the tab buttons in the sidebar when hovered

properties.name: --ag-side-button-selected-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the selected tab button in the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-button-selected-text-color
properties.description: Text color of the selected tab button in the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-button-border
properties.description: Border drawn above and below tab buttons in the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-button-selected-border
properties.description: Border drawn above and below the selected tab button in the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-side-button-left-padding
properties.description: Padding to the left of the text in tab buttons in the sidebar (this is always the padding on the inward facing side of the button, so in right-to-left layout it will be on the right)

properties.name: --ag-side-button-right-padding
properties.description: Padding to the right of the text in tab buttons in the sidebar (this is always the padding on the outward facing side of the button, so in right-to-left layout it will be on the left)

properties.name: --ag-side-button-vertical-padding
properties.description: Padding above and below the text in tab buttons in the sidebar

properties.name: --ag-subtle-text-color
properties.description: Color of text and UI elements that should stand out less than the default.

properties.name: --ag-text-color
properties.description: Default color for all text

properties.name: --ag-toggle-button-width
properties.description: Width of the whole toggle button component

properties.name: --ag-toggle-button-height
properties.description: Height of the whole toggle button component

properties.name: --ag-toggle-button-off-background-color
properties.description: Color of the toggle button background in its 'off' state

properties.name: --ag-toggle-button-on-background-color
properties.description: Color of the toggle button background in its 'on' state

properties.name: --ag-toggle-button-switch-background-color
properties.description: Background color of the toggle button switch (the bit that slides from left to right)

properties.name: --ag-toggle-button-switch-inset
properties.description: The amount that the toggle switch is inset from the edge of the button

properties.name: --ag-tool-panel-separator-border
properties.description: The dividing line between sections of menus e.g. column menu and right-click context menu

properties.name: --ag-tooltip-background-color
properties.description: Background color for tooltips

properties.name: --ag-tooltip-border
properties.description: Border for tooltips

properties.name: --ag-tooltip-text-color
properties.description: Text color for tooltips

properties.name: --ag-value-change-delta-down-color
properties.description: Color to temporarily apply to cell data when its value decreases in an agAnimateShowChangeCellRenderer cell

properties.name: --ag-value-change-delta-up-color
properties.description: Color to temporarily apply to cell data when its value increases in an agAnimateShowChangeCellRenderer cell

properties.name: --ag-value-change-value-highlight-background-color
properties.description: Background color to apply when a cell value changes and enableCellChangeFlash is enabled

properties.name: --ag-widget-container-horizontal-padding
properties.description: The horizontal padding of containers that contain stacked widgets, such as menus and tool panels

properties.name: --ag-widget-container-vertical-padding
properties.description: The vertical padding of containers that contain stacked widgets, such as menus and tool panels

properties.name: --ag-widget-horizontal-spacing
properties.description: The spacing between widgets in containers arrange widgets horizontally

properties.name: --ag-widget-vertical-spacing
properties.description: The spacing between widgets in containers arrange widgets vertically

properties.name: --ag-wrapper-border
properties.description: Borders around the outside of the grid

properties.name: --ag-wrapper-border-radius
properties.description: Corner radius of the outermost container around the grid.

properties.name: --ag-status-bar-label-color
properties.description: Text color for labels in the status bar component

properties.name: --ag-status-bar-label-font-weight
properties.description: Font weight for labels in the status bar component

properties.name: --ag-status-bar-value-color
properties.description: Text color for values in the status bar component

properties.name: --ag-status-bar-value-font-weight
properties.description: Font weight for values in the status bar component
